person.note: Main character (purported) of the romance. Based on the legend of Florinda la Cava. Daughter of Count Julian and [his wife]. Sweetheart of [Alphonso]. Raped by King Roderigo.
King of Spain. Husband of Zabra. Based on historical figure Roderic, last Visigothic king. In the legend of Florinda la Cava, his rape of Florinda leads to an invasion led by Count Julian.
Attendant of Fidelia. Sister of Alphonso. Virginal friend of Florinda who urges her to patience.
Father of Florinda. His wife is unnamed but present. Legendary figure, probably ahistorical. His outrage over his daughter's rape leads him to invade Roderigo's kingdom.

person.persName: Julian's wife, count's wife, Florinda's mother
person.note: Mother of Florinda. Wife of Julian. Unnamed but present in Pulter's romance.
Beloved of Florinda. Brother of Castabella. Ordered by Roderigo to accompany Ithocles in order to get him away from court.
Brother of Fidelia. An African prince in exile.
Queen of Spain. Wife of Roderigo. Originally a Moorish princess but converted to Christianity before her marriage.
